short_summary: Multi-spectral imaging sensors for the Department of Agriculture and Actual Food
description: This invitation procures the purchase, delivery of one multi-spectral imager for the Department of Agriculture and Actual Food from Swift Current Research and Development Source Center
full_summary:
### Tender Announcement 01581-230137-Multi-spectral Imager (2)

**Tender Number and Reference**
Although you can deduce the tender number, **the reference number is WS3554656164-Doc3668290052**.

**Amendment Notice**
There is **one amendment to the original tender**. The vendor is requested to disregard the **incorrect closing time on the Ariba Discovery posting and Buyandsell posting**. Instead, the tender **must be received by 14:00 CDT on 2022-10-03**. Submissions received later than the specified time will be declared non-responsive.

**Notice Details**
* **Publication Date:** 2022-09-15
* **Tender Closing Date:** 2022-10-03, 14:00 CDT
* **Expected Contract Start Date:** 2023-03-31
* **Expected Contract End Date:** 2023-03-31

**Goods and Services Required**
The **Agriculture and Agri-Food Canada, Swift Current Research and Development Centre** requires **one Multi-Spectral Imager** for use at **Swift Current, Saskatchewan**. The deliverables must be **received by 2023-03-31**.

**Procurement Details**
* **Procurement Category:** Goods
* **Procurement Method:** Competitive - Open Bidding
* **Notice Type:** Request for Proposal
* **Trade Agreements:** Canadian Free Trade Agreement
* **Contracting Entity:** Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)

**Contact Information**
* **Point of Contact:** Wall, Ruwani (SPAC/PSPC)
* **Email:** ruwani.wall@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca
* **Notice URL:** http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/14116479?extsite=MTQxMTY0NzlfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==

**Language**
The documents related to this tender are available in **both English and French**.

**Compliance**
* Vendors are requested to provide **all required supporting documentation** and submit their bid by the specified deadline.
* Any bid submissions received after the specified deadline will be declared non-responsive.
* The above details are subject to the **Unified National Standard Product Classifications (UNSPC)** system.

### Mandatory Requirements
The detailed list of mandatory specifications is provided in **Annex A**.
